mapper.insert: insert into baomingbiao(stuID, stuName, sex, profession, english, average, gratitude, stuStatus, phone, myself, file) values(#{stuID}, #{stuName}, #{sex}, #{profession}, #{english}, #{average}, #{gratitude}, #{stuStatus}, #{phone}, #{myself}, #{file})
mapper.delete: delete from baomingbiao where stuID= (select studentid from user where id=#{id})
mapper.select: select * from baomingbiao where id = (select s.id from baomingbiao s left outer join user u on s.stuID=u.studentid where u.id=#{id})
select stuID, stuName, audit from baomingbiao where id = (select s.id from baomingbiao s left outer join user u on s.stuID=u.studentid where u.id=#{id})
